description: Tofu steaks roast beautifully in this colourful traybake.
name: Piri Piri Tofu Traybake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, peeled and chopped
2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and chopped into wedges
2 medium corn on the cob, sliced in half

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Pat the tofu dry with a paper towel and score each steak with a knife.

Drizzle a large baking tray with the oil and add the sweet potatoes, capsicums, onion, corn on the cob, sliced lemon and tofu steaks. Sprinkle over the herbs and spices, add the maple syrup and lemon juice and mix very well to coat.
Roast for 45 minutes or until the sweet potatoes are tender, and serve.
